> <OLD>
>
> Hydras growled angered by the ckick but he was able to transfor in beast
> mode and spread his hydras heads. They bite Megastorm's shoulder, arms, a
> leg and one directly attempted to bite the chest.
>
>
> The Hydras heads shook violently attemping to destroy megastorm,

<NEW>

There was a roar of pain and anger as HYDRAS' heads bit into
MEGASTORM! The shoulders and arms sparked as HYDRAS' teeth attempt to
sink into them.

"All these little heads!" MEGASTORM said with a grunt. "This is a
waste of time!"

As one of HYDRAS' head came into towards MEGASTORM's chest, the
PREDACON aimed his rifle at HYDRAS' own chest and fired full power!!

(TAG)

- Preston
